modName: Big and Beautiful Weapons - Standalone - DELETED
summary: adds 4 great weapons to your game
descriptionHtml:
my first contribution for this great site (i hope i did everything right lol).
This is a standalone for the great mod by Hentai that made these textures (without them i would do nothing so hey a great thanks to him) now im publishing this
without his consent i hope he dont get mad at me lol (if he dont like it just tell me and i take it out).

here it is the original file: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5828 -By Hentai

so here it is 4 new weapons for your fun.

they are added to the Daedric tab to craft and you can temper them to

or if your lazy and want them by code just type help \"Battle Fairy\" 4 
and then player.additem xxxxxxx (where x is the code that it gives ya)

Install:
just extract all the files to your Skyrim main folder

Unistall:
take the fairy folder from The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons and The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\weapons.

Have Fun!
author: Silver
